mapper.select: SELECT T.ID, T.PROJECT_ID, NVL(P.PROJECT_NAME, T.PROJECT_NAME) AS PROJECT_NAME, NVL(P.CATEGORY, T.CATEGORY) AS CATEGORY, T.JOB_CONTENT, T.WORKING_HOUR, T.STATUS, R.PROCESS_NOTE AS PROCESS_NOTE, U.HRCODE AS HRCODE, U.USERALIAS AS PRINCIPAL, T.WORK_TIME AS WORK_TIME, T.WORK_TIME_END AS WORK_TIME_END, T.WORK_TIME_BEGIN AS WORK_TIME_BEGIN FROM BG_WORKINGHOUR_INFO T LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_USER U ON U.USERNAME = T.APPROVER LEFT JOIN BG_PROJECT_INFO P ON T.PROJECT_ID = P.ID AND P.STATUS = '1' LEFT JOIN BG_PROCESS_RECORD R ON T.PROCESS_ID = R.ID AND R.VALID = 1 WHERE (T.WORK_TIME_BEGIN >= TO_DATE(#{dataBegin}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND T.WORK_TIME_END <= TO_DATE(#{dataEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND T.WORKER = #{username} AND T.VALID = 1 ORDER BY T.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT nvl(SUM(T.WORKING_HOUR),0) FROM BG_WORKINGHOUR_INFO T WHERE (T.WORK_TIME_BEGIN >= TO_DATE(#{dataBegin}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND T.WORK_TIME_END <= TO_DATE(#{dataEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND T.WORKER = #{currentUsername} AND T.VALID = '1' AND (T.STATUS = '1' or T.STATUS='3')

SELECT T.CATEGORY, T.ID, T.PROJECT_NAME, T.PROJECT_NUMBER, T.WBS_NUMBER, T1.EMPNAME AS PRINCIPAL, T1.HRCODE AS HRCODE FROM BG_PROJECT_INFO T LEFT JOIN BG_PROJECT_USER T1 ON T.ID = T1.PROJECT_ID AND T1.STATUS = '1' LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_USER T2 ON T1.HRCODE = T2.HRCODE LEFT JOIN BG_PROJECT_USER T4 ON T4.PROJECT_ID = T.ID AND T4.ROLE = '1' AND T4.STATUS = '1' and ( T4.START_DATE between TO_DATE(#{dataBegin}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE(#{dataEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') or T4.END_DATE between TO_DATE(#{dataBegin}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE(#{dataEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') or (TO_DATE(#{dataBegin}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >=T4.START_DATE and TO_DATE(#{dataEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= T4.END_DATE) or(TO_DATE(#{dataBegin}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <=T4.START_DATE and TO_DATE(#{dataEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= T4.END_DATE)) WHERE ((T.CATEGORY IN ('JS', 'KY', 'HX', 'QT') AND T2.USERNAME = #{username} AND ( T1.START_DATE between TO_DATE(#{dataBegin}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE(#{dataEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') or T1.END_DATE between TO_DATE(#{dataBegin}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE(#{dataEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') or (TO_DATE(#{dataBegin}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >=T1.START_DATE and TO_DATE(#{dataEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= T1.END_DATE) or(TO_DATE(#{dataBegin}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <=T1.START_DATE and TO_DATE(#{dataEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= T1.END_DATE) )) OR (T.CATEGORY IN ('CG', 'BP') AND #{deptId} IN (SELECT D.DEPTID FROM BG_SYS_DEPT D WHERE D.VALID = '1' START WITH D.DEPTID = T.ORGAN_INFO CONNECT BY PRIOR D.DEPTID = D.PDEPTID))) AND ( T1.START_DATE between TO_DATE(#{dataBegin}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE(#{dataEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') or T1.END_DATE between TO_DATE(#{dataBegin}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_DATE(#{dataEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') or (TO_DATE(#{dataBegin}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >=T1.START_DATE and TO_DATE(#{dataEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= T1.END_DATE) or(TO_DATE(#{dataBegin}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <=T1.START_DATE and TO_DATE(#{dataEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= T1.END_DATE) ) AND T.STATUS = '1' AND T.PROJECT_STATUS = '1'
AND T.PROJECT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{proName}||'%'
AND T.PROJECT_NUMBER = #{proNumber}
ORDER BY T.CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT t.project_name， (SELECT name FROM BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY WHERE pcode='category100002' and vaild=1 and code=t.category) as category, t.id, t.wbs_number, t.project_number, (SELECT t1.empname FROM BG_PROJECT_USER t1 WHERE t1.project_id = t.id AND t1.role = '1' AND t1.status = '1') as principal, (SELECT t1.hrcode FROM BG_PROJECT_USER t1 WHERE t1.project_id = t.id AND t1.role = '1' AND t1.status = '1') as hrcode FROM BG_PROJECT_INFO t WHERE #{username} IN (SELECT t1.username FROM BG_SYS_USER t1 JOIN BG_PROJECT_USER t2 ON t1.hrcode=t2.hrcode WHERE t2.project_id=t.id AND t2.status='1') AND t.status='1' AND t.project_status = '1' ORDER BY t.create_date DESC

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(DECODE(tws.schedule_type, 0, DECODE(SIGN(tws.today_hours - 8), 1, (tws.today_hours - 8), 0), 1, tws.today_hours)),0) FROM (SELECT wh.*, ws.schedule_type FROM (SELECT t.work_time, SUM(t.working_hour) as today_hours FROM BG_WORKINGHOUR_INFO t WHERE t.worker = #{username} AND t.status IN ('1','3') AND t.valid=1
AND t.work_time >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND t.work_time <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND t.work_time <> TO_DATE(#{selectedDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY t.work_time) wh JOIN BG_SYS_WORK_SCHEDULE ws ON wh.work_time = ws.schedule_date) tws
SELECT bws.schedule_type FROM BG_SYS_WORK_SCHEDULE bws WHERE bws.schedule_date = TO_DATE(#{selectedDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT * FROM (SELECT U.HRCODE AS "hrcode", U.USERALIAS AS "name" FROM BG_SYS_APPROVAL_USER_R_SUBTYPE T LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_USER U ON U.USERID = T.USER_ID LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT P ON T.MANAGE_DEPT = P.DEPTID AND P.VALID = 1 WHERE #{deptId} IN (SELECT P1.DEPTID FROM BG_SYS_DEPT P1 WHERE P1.VALID = 1 START WITH P1.DEPTID = P.DEPTID CONNECT BY PRIOR P1.DEPTID = P1.PDEPTID) AND T.SUBTYPE = (SELECT R.APPROVAL_ROLE FROM BG_SYS_APPROVAL_RULE R JOIN BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY D ON R.SUBMIT_ROLE = D.CODE WHERE R.APPROVAL_ROLE_ORGANTYPE = (SELECT P.CODE FROM BG_SYS_APPROVAL_DEPT_R_ORGTYPE O LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY P ON P.ID = O.ORGAN_TYPE AND P.VAILD = 1 WHERE ROWNUM = 1 AND #{deptId} IN (SELECT P1.DEPTID FROM BG_SYS_DEPT P1 WHERE P1.VALID = 1 START WITH P1.DEPTID = O.ORGAN_ID CONNECT BY PRIOR P1.DEPTID = P1.PDEPTID))
AND D.SORT_ID = #{subType} AND R.IS_DEFAULT = 1 AND D.PCODE = 'submitUserType' AND R.VALID = 1 AND D.VAILD = 1) AND T.VALID = 1 ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(T.PRIORITY) ASC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

select u.hrcode as "hrcode", u.useralias as "name", p.deptname "deptName" from BG_SYS_APPROVAL_USER_R_SUBTYPE t left join BG_SYS_USER u on u.userid = t.user_id left join BG_SYS_DEPT p on t.manage_dept = p.deptid and p.valid = 1 where #{deptId} in (select p1.deptid from BG_SYS_DEPT p1 where p1.valid = 1 start with p1.deptid = p.deptid connect by prior p1.deptid = p1.pdeptid) and t.subtype in (select r.approval_role from BG_SYS_APPROVAL_RULE r join BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY d on r.submit_role = d.code where r.approval_role_organtype = (select p.code from bg_sys_approval_dept_r_orgtype r left join BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY p on p.id = r.organ_type and p.vaild = 1 where rownum = 1 and #{deptId} in ( select p1.deptid from BG_SYS_DEPT p1 where p1.valid = 1 start with p1.deptid = r.organ_id connect by prior p1.deptid = p1.pdeptid)) and d.sort_id = (select nvl(to_number(min(c.sort_id)), 10) from BG_SYS_APPROVAL_USER_R_SUBTYPE t left join BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY c on c.code = t.subtype where t.user_id = #{userId} and c.pcode = 'submitUserType' and t.valid = 1 and c.vaild = 1) and d.pcode = 'submitUserType' and r.valid = 1 and d.vaild = 1) and t.valid = 1 order by t.subtype,to_number(t.priority)
